description: This file contains security-related functions for WhatsApp webhook validation, including environment-based secret retrieval and signature validation logic.

methods.name: is_development_mode
methods.description: Checks if the application is running in development mode based on environment variable.

methods.name: get_app_secret
methods.description: Retrieves the WhatsApp app secret from environment variables, raising an error if not set in production.

methods.name: validate_webhook_signature
methods.description: Validates the webhook payload's signature using SHA256, with bypass in development mode.
